title: RIP Apple TV HD: Apple went all-in on 4K yesterday
description: 4K TV adoption hasn't been slowing down, and Apple knows the HD era is over.

title: Tired of laundry folding? AI breaks the robot folding speed record
description: Two-armed method doesn't beat human speeds but leaves older folding robots in the dust.

title: Tesla releases $550 AC charger with standard plug, not Tesla’s plug
description: The new wallbox uses the J1772 plug; Tesla owners will use an included adapter.

title: The FTC is looking at fixing appliance repair, but it needs to go beyond manuals
description: Firmware access and parts are also needed for a real repair push.

title: Intel details sort-of-annoying fix for high idle power consumption in Arc GPUs
description: One of several teething issues for Intel's first stab at a dedicated GPU.

title: New Jersey sues gas companies over climate change damages worth billions
description: Lawsuit targets ExxonMobil, Shell, Chevron, BP, and ConocoPhillips.

title: BMW will invest $1.7 billion to make EVs in the United States
description: By 2030 BMW will build six different EV models in Spartanburg, South Carolina.

title: Pixel Watch teardown shows off “ugly” insides, gives strong first-gen vibes
description: iFixit shows exactly how difficult it'll be to fix those cracked displays.

title: Baby chicks are wary of prey with eyespots because of “Mona Lisa effect”
description: Chick experiments hint at why eyespots evolved independently in different species.

title: What Bayonetta 3’s drama tells us about the market for video game voice work
description: Union was unable to secure demanded residual payments after their last strike.

title: Starlink unveils airplane service—Musk says it’s like using Internet at home
description: Airplane operators can reserve now for Starlink deliveries in mid-2023.

title: Thunderbolt’s next spec triples bandwidth to 120Gbps—with a catch
description: Next-gen Thunderbolt will auto-switch from 80 to 120Gbps with fancy monitors.

title: After 80 years, a Nazi shipwreck is causing environmental damage
description: Study of one wreck supports the idea that its 50,000 peers may leak pollutants.

title: AI is changing scientists’ understanding of language learning
description: And it is also raising questions about innate grammar.

title: “Data in the Desert” hints at the future of autonomous vehicles
description: UK-based Wejo unveils new operating system to "democratize" AV data.

title: What do you get when you cross an e-bike with a supercar?
description: The Vintage Roadster offers a load of performance in a gorgeous package.
